alert.note: Alert for Camden; Gloucester; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 2:24PM EDT until August 10 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Salem County in southern New Jersey... South central Camden County in southern New Jersey... Central Gloucester County in southern New Jersey... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 224 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elmer, or 15 miles north of Bridgeton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Glassboro, Pitman, Clayton, Franklinville, Victory Lakes, Sicklerville, Williamstown, Monroe Township, Turnersville and Pine Hill. This includes Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 37 and 43. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
